name: Visage
title: Necro'lic
lore: A gargoyle bound to guard the Narrow Maze, Visage commands familiars and drains souls.

graveChillVisage.name: Grave Chill
graveChillVisage.description: Steals movement and attack speed from an enemy.

soulAssumption.name: Soul Assumption
soulAssumption.description: Launches a soul blast that deals damage based on nearby damage dealt.

gravekeepersCloak.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
gravekeepersCloak.description: Visage gains layers that reduce damage taken. Layers regenerate over time.

summonFamiliars.name: Summon Familiars
summonFamiliars.description: Summons stone gargoyles that can stun enemies by diving.
